long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension is designed for CSMiddler users to improve their trading experience on csmiddler.com, as well as some other great features to have - such as blocking phising Steam-pages.

Highlights:
- Opt-in: Cookie authentication of trades, in order to automate the trading process such as Buff163
- Opt-in: Client-sided authentication of trades, but for a trade to be verified via this process both seller and buyer have to utilize it.
- Phising website blocker
- Pre-filling description and items on the Steam-tradeoffer page (as the seller) when selling through CSMiddler.com.

You can opt-in and out through the popup.

Transparency:
Open-sourced on https://github.com/csmiddler/extension.
